Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: sooo good, and the hot chocolate hit the spot just right on such a cold day! would definitely visit again hehe! :)

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: I was a bit sad because I couldn't find a waffle place that seemed to have good waffles - up until our last day, when we found this cute little kiosk. ‚Ä¶

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: If you are looking for a very cosy, nice place to have coffee or a waffle before, between or after your museum, this is a great place!

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: Friendly service, fluent in English, and cheap prices in the shadow of the museum. Couldn't ask for more!

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: The most delicious waffles. I recommend a whipped cream topping :)

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: Nice variety of coffees (even good Spanish cortado) and good warm waffles.

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: LITERALLY THE BEST WAFFLE IVE EVER HAD. Totally recommend. Really good sandwiches too. And great placement in a beautiful area, so you can eat and have the most stunning view. Lots of buskers so good music as well.

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh

Name: Kiosk Rembrandt Van Gogh
Review Text: Nice spot to really enjoy a top breakfast (bacon and eggs) after a.m. and after a bike tour with kingbikes at the church street in Amsterdam. Thank you guys ! See your next time.
